altTitles.ja: こどものじかん ほうかご

altTitles.vi: Thời Gian Của Bé Con: Hậu Tan Trường

description.en: This is a side history of "Kodomo no Jikan" original story. It is a recopilation of some one-shots, 4-koma and side-stories, with a special, with the events after the last chapter (093) from the main story.

Tobari, who has bad luck, finds himself in big trouble. It all starts when Saeki, the most popular guy in school, confesses his love to him in front of the whole school...!? Emuemuo's cute trouble love!!
Akihiko Shimura, 20 years old (male). When I woke up in the morning, I was a little blonde loli.
description.ru: Акихико Симура — 20-летний мужчина, который, проснувшись как-то утром, стал маленькой девочкой-блондинкой.

altTitles.ja: 海が走るエンドロール

description.en:
After turning 65 and bereaved of her husband, Umiko visits a cinema for the first time in decades. A shocking, life-changing event awaits her. When she meets Kai, an art student majoring in film, Umiko realises that she wants to make a film. She realises that she is on the side of "the people who want to make films"...
Lured by the waves that stir her heart, the 65-year-old dives into the sea of film!
description.ja:
65歳を過ぎ夫と死別し、数十年ぶりに映画館を訪れたうみ子。そこには、人生を変える衝撃的な出来事が待っていた。海(カイ)という映像専攻の美大生に出会い、うみ子は気づく。自分は「映画が撮りたい側」の人間なのだと……。
心を騒ぎ立てる波に誘われ、65歳、映画の海へとダイブする!!

title.en: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu

altTitles.ja: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます

altTitles.en: Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!

description.en:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: てんで性悪キューピッド

description.en: The Koinobori yakuza family's souls are expensive commodoties, a source of great pride to those of the demon world's soul bank. But when the Koinobori heir, Ryuji, is born with a pure soul engrossed with fairies and angels, it's up to Maria to become his personal cupid and reform him so that he continues the Koinobori's lascivious family line!

title.en: I Tamed a Tyrant and Ran Away

J'ai apprivoisé un tyran et me suis enfuie

altTitles.ja: 暴君を手懐けて逃げてしまった

altTitles.vi: Thuần Hóa Bạo Chúa Rồi Bỏ Trốn

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

title.en: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!

altTitles.ja: 森で聖女を拾った最強の吸血姫～娘のためなら国でもあっさり滅ぼします！～@COMIC

description.en:
The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "The Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today.
The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter!?
After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption.
Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection.
One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath!
The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means!

A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!

Kang Jihyoung,wanted to become a hunter for his mother.

However, his bullies put his mother into a vegetative state. He tried to take revenge but was thoroughly crushed and trapped...

The boy who lost everything became a beast and began his hunt.
description.ko: 엄마를 위해 헌터가 되려 했던 주인공 지형. 그러나 일진들이 엄마를 식물인간으로 만든다. 복수하려 했지만, 철저히 부서지고 갇히는데… 모든 걸 잃은 소년은 마수가 되어 사냥을 시작한다.

description.en: Trouble brews for a sucker for pretty faces! A dirt-poor commoner and ray of sunshine, Jiang Jiao Jiao(straight guy) falls for Zhong Ming Yu's (male) looks at first sight! After an unexpected accident, the once cold and aloof young lord has transformed into a dainty, fragile ["Little Sister Lin"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lin_Daiyu), even using his good looks to win the affections of the other party!! However, as their relationship deepens, Jiang Jiao Jiao begins to uncover Ming Yu’s dark, obsessive tendencies and a massive family secret spanning two generations...
description.zh: 颜狗大危机！阳光土狗蒋骄骄(直男)对钟悯玉（男）的脸一见钟情! 一场意外，让原本高不可攀的冷面贵公子摇身一变成为撒娇易碎的“林妹妹”，还利用自己的美貌获得对方垂青！！ 可随着交往渐深，蒋骄骄逐渐发现钟悯玉的病娇本性，还有背后藏家族和两代人的巨大秘密…

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

altTitles.tl: Ang magaling sa pang-aasar na (dating) si Takagi-san

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.tl: Pagkatapos ng maraming taon ng pagtitiis sa mga panunukso ni Takagi, napagtanto ni Nishikata na ang kanyang presensya sa buhay niya ay naging hindi mapapalitan. Ngayon na sila ay kasal, mas makulay ang mga araw na kanilang ginugugol na magkasama, salamat sa mga kalokohan ng kanilang pilyang anak na si Chii. Naimpluwensyahan ng kanyang ina, may ugali si Chii na manloko sa kanyang ama, na ikinadidismaya nito. Bagamat sinusubukan din ni Chi na lokohin ang kanyang ina, tila wala ni isa sa pamilya ang makatalo sa eksperto sa pang-aasar sa kanyang sariling laro.
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

ชีวิตครั้งใหม่ ของยัยตัวร้าย

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.
description.zh:
前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

description.pt-br: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric. Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira … de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
"Do you want to skip class with Sensei?" 
"I'm fine!"

Miyake Mia has always worn the mask of an exemplary student. Recently, however, there is someone who draws a lot of attention to her. That's Nurse Morikubo, who is rumored to be a "delinquent" within the school....
description.ja: 学校でも家でも、いつも優等生としての猫をかぶっている三宅みあ。勉強と家事で忙しく、恋愛どころか本音で話せる友達もいない…そんな彼女が最近気になっているのが、校内で「不良」とウワサされている保健医の森久保先生で…。
description.es-la:
"¿Quieres saltarte la clase con la enfermera? "¡Estoy bien así!"

Miyake Mia siempre ha llevado la máscara de una estudiante ejemplar. Sin embargo, recientemente, hay alguien que le llama mucho la atención. Esa es la enfermera Morikubo, quien se le rumorea como una "delincuente" dentro de la escuela...

¡Una historia de amor puro entre una estudiante de secundaria que oculta su verdadero yo y una "profesora de la enfermería" delincuente!

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

description.en: In a world where magic has become a myth, Erthea is racing against time before it succumbs to darkness. A century after the defeat of the Titan, the source of magic and balance, four young heroes - Gem, Nexo, Rubi, and Atoū - embark on a desperate mission. They must deliver the Destiny Gems, created by ancient heroes, before they expire. These gems grant extraordinary powers and contain the souls of the heroes. However, Nickel Krants, a once-revered hero turned powerful antagonist, seeks to steal the gems to resurrect his lost friends. The protagonists will face rival cults, demons, and adversities. Guided by the mysterious cosmic entity Theo, they must overcome their limitations and unite to save Erthea. Can they fulfill their mission before time runs out?

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

description.ja: 青春＝友情、努力、未来予知!? 最強無敵の異能力ギャルが送る、ごくごく普通の超常的な日常。 累計再生数1.6億回！本作の元となったYoutubeチャンネル「私立パラの丸高校」では、みらい＆ へー子の最強異能力ギャルズの他、光やクラスメイト達の声優ボイス付き動画がたくさん見れるので、ぜひチェックしてみてください!!

description.en: Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension, and it has been a few years since peace was restored, thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu, our protagonist, was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent, however, is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.
description.ko:
나는 인베이더를 죽이는 사람이 되고 싶다. 
―
인베이더를 죽이고 특수종의 세상에 살며 일상의 행복도 유지하고 싶다. 
그걸 바라면 안 될까? 
왜? 왜 그래서는 안 되나. 
두 마리 토끼를 쫓다가는 둘 다 놓친다고 하지만, 
안 놓치면 된다.

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
description.pt-br: Suguru e Kakeru são dois irmãos que jogam futebol como ninguém. Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. O que poderá acontecer para que Kakeru mude de ideia e volte a ajudar o time de dentro de campo, onde seu irmão o espera??

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

Momiji Kuramichi has all the passion in the world for the game of shogi. Unfortunately, he has none of the talent. This is especially frustrating because his brother was a legend in the game. How can he be such a flop? He's developed a unique way of dealing with his frustration—head-butting everything! But you can't headbutt your way to victory in shogi. Is he doomed to wither under the shadow of his brother forever?

description.en:
Asato Kanami who was summoned as a hero to another world Istalia. 

 To stop the war between the demons and humans, it is said that he was summoned by Anna, the saint of the Kingdom of Elshnon.  

After a year of war, Asato finally challenges the Demon King Lione. Just when he thought the battle was over, his summoner Anna attacked him and the Demon King.  

Asato who survived the attack and was protected by the Demon King. What is the future path for the hero betrayed by humans…!?

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en: When one day a Meteorite crushed on earth, the lifes of the three best friends Hitokazu, Nic and Victor suddenly changed as on their last jointed school-year they are faced with the consequences the meteorite brought with itself. The people that had survived the impact have suddenly developed powers and abilities human beings normally can not achieve but those who didnt gain those new abilities, just dissolved.

One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

In a world where everyone struggles to live, Onmirae, the only boy who wants death.
One day, a death squad appeared in front of him and offered him a proposal. ‘I’ll kill you, let’s rebuild human society together’ To
die, you have to save everyone.

title.en: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Câu chuyện về thầy giáo Schale Kadoya Tsukasa

description.en: Anyone who is a fan of the Kamen Rider genre probably knows Kamen Rider Decade, also known as Kadoya Tsukasa;  world destroyer... The story is about Decade working as a sensei in the Blue Archive world
Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.
description.vi: Keitarou, chàng trai có khả năng thu hút ma quỷ, được thuê làm gia sư cho một cô bé mang tên gọi Yayoi, người có thể trông thấy ma quỷ và đang trong công cuộc tìm kiếm con ma đã mang người mẹ của mình đi mất.

description.en: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!

After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.
description.id:
Siegbert yang selalu tertimpa kemalangan di kehidupan sebelumnya, sekarang ia tereinkarnasi ke dunia lain.
Ia tidak mengira keluarga barunya merupakan keluarga yang hangat karena kemalangan yang ia hadapi di kehidupan sebelumnya.
Akan tetapi, apakah ia akan tetap dihujani oleh kemalangan bahkan setelah tereinkarnasi?

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

altTitles.ja: たっちゃん、どっちとる？

description.en:
Let's be close friends together, the three of us ♡.

Tatsuya—nicknamed “Tacchan”—is a college student who ends up freeloading at the home of his twin childhood friends, Ritsuka and Futaba. The three of them were close friends, but the twins grew up to be cute, and their feelings of love for Tacchan seem like they're about to run wild!?

A slightly lewd and heart-pounding cohabitation romantic comedy ♡.
description.ja:
***3人でいっぱい『なかよし』しよ♡***

大学生の『たっちゃん』こと瀬戸竜哉は、幼なじみの双子『立花』と『双葉』の家に同居することになる。
『仲良し』だった3人だが、可愛く成長した双子の『たっちゃん』への恋心は暴走気味で――。
ちょっとえっちなときめき同居ラブコメディ♡


---

- [公式 Web](https://comiccune.jp/series/tatchan)
description.es-la:
Seamos "amigos" los tres ♡

Tatsuya, alias "Tatchan", un estudiante universitario, acaba quedándose en casa de sus amigos de la infancia, las mellizos Rikka y Futaba.
Los tres eran "buenos amigos", pero, ¿el amor de los mellizos por el guapo y maduro Tatchan parece haberse descontrolado...?
Una comedia romántica ligeramente erótica y emocionante ♡

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

description.en: Maou Shaitan Geneha, a demon lord whose powers were sealed away, seeks out the descendant of the one who sealed her; company employee Shishibe Yashiro. Wanting Yashiro to undo the seal, Maou forms a contract with her, aiming to satisfy Yashiro in the hopes that she'll undo the seal.
description.ja: ヘトヘトOL社（やしろ）のもとにやってきたバカでか人外の魔王。遥か昔に魔族の力を封印した術者の末裔である社を拷問し、封印を解かせにきた……かと思いきや、「余の力でお前を幸せにしてみせようぞ！」と突然のプロポーズ!? キュートな姿になった魔王に、社は幸せにされてしまうのか――!?

title.en: The War of Greedy Witches: 32 of the Wickedest Women Duel to the Death

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.en: The Great Witch War: 32 Genius Witches Kill Each Other

description.en:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171)
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: 泣き虫とココアの百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between a Crybaby and a Girl Named Kokoa
Taiyou no Ichiwaru, 太陽のイヂワル,  太陽のイヂワル 惣領冬実傑作短編集

description.en:
A collection of four short stories by Fuyumi Souryou.  
  
The Rainbow Fish is a story about a painter and her problems dealing with a culture that doesn't leave too much space for artistic inspiration. From a little girl to adulthood, Sari struggles to show how she sees life through her eyes. This story is something of an autobiography.  
  
Damned Sun is about a cynical girl who isn't very enthusiastic about most things teenagers like. She meets a man, a funny, interesting gangster. They get along very well from the beginning, understanding each other without too many words… But it only lasts one day, since what shakes Maki from her apathy can't last long…  
  
Strange Trait asks the question: Are human beings are like groceries? Do they really have a certain durability? A writer thinks so, and she bases her novel on the idea.  
  
A Strange Gene is about Ayano Yoshimusa; a superb worker, efficient, accurate, and cold. Saegusa, her colleague, is her opposite: messy, chaotic and warm. He admires his boss, whenever he talks to her he realises what a perfect creature she is. But as always, not everything is what it seems. When a sixteen years old appears and tells him she lives with Ayano, Saegusa seems to perceive that something might be hidden under the perfect appearance of this beautiful woman.

Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

description.en:
Chika Suzugamori, a rookie manga artist, has been getting rejected every time she submits a new draft.

On the verge of giving up, she suddenly gets the idea of going on a journey-

A journey that heals precisely because it's rough - the ultimate travel comic!
description.ja:
ここではない、どこか。そこに私が待っている——。

新人漫画家の鈴ヶ森ちかは、ネームを持ち込む度に全ボツを食らっていた。
心が折れかけた彼女だが、唐突に旅に出ることを思い立ち——。
ざつな旅だからこそ癒やされる、究極旅コミック！
description.es-la:
Chika Suzugamori, una artista de manga novata, ha sido rechazada cada vez que presenta un nuevo borrador. 

A punto de rendirse, de repente se le ocurre la idea de emprender un viaje... 
Un viaje que se cura precisamente porque es duro: ¡el cómic de viajes definitivo!

altTitles.ja-ro: Magika no Kenshi to Shoukan Maou

altTitles.ja: 魔技科の剣士と召喚魔王

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔技科的劍士與召喚魔王

altTitles.th: จอมดาบมนตรากับราชาอัญเชิญ

altTitles.zh: 魔技科的剑士与召唤魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Ma-waza-ka no Kenshi to Shōkan Maō

description.en:
15 years ago the world discovered magic as well as mythical beings (basically beings from various legends) in another dimension. Humankind learned to summon these dangerous mythical beings and use their power to great effect. 7 countries formed contracts with these "Diva" and gained their alligence as a result. Diva will chose their summoners on their 14th birthday and give them a stigma. Schools have been set up to train summoners and magical swordsman (basically bodyguards that give the summoners time to cast their spell) as a result.  
  
15 years later after the finding of magic Hayashizaki Kazuki is chosen as a summoner and given a stigma to indicate that. This is surprising since males aren't chosen as summoners due to their low amount of mana compared to females. As the first male to be a summoner Kazuki is under a lot of scrutiny by almost everyone.  
  
To complicate matters his sister (who's a magical swordsman) is against him going into summoner school to train there as a summoner. Because summoners and magical swordsman have a cat mouse thing going on where summoners look down on magical swordsman as inferior so his sister naturally is against him going there. She'll stop him even if it means going to war.  
  
Kazuki however is determined to thrive in summoner school and have already determined to give it his all. Even if he's the lowest ranked student (ranked E) and his fellow students intend to demean him he'll prove himself as the strongest summoner.  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Mihara Mitsuki and illustrated by CHuN.  
  
The manga is published in Monthly Comic Alive, a seinen manga magazine by Media Factory.  
  
————————————————————————————————————————————  
  
**Chapters 54-74 already available by official release and they will therefore not be available here.**

**Wikipedia**
- [Chinese (Traditional)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AD%94%E6%8A%80%E7%A7%91%E3%81%AE%E5%89%A3%E5%A3%AB%E3%81%A8%E5%8F%AC%E5%96%9A%E9%AD%94%E7%8E%8B)
- [Japanese](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AD%94%E6%8A%80%E7%A7%91%E3%81%AE%E5%89%A3%E5%A3%AB%E3%81%A8%E5%8F%AC%E5%96%9A%E9%AD%94%E7%8E%8B)
- [Spanish](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magika_no_Kenshi_to_Sh%C5%8Dkan_Ma%C5%8D)

Rei Yokoyamada, a high school boy who has a movie producer father. One day, while out with friends to shoot a film that he plans to enter into a film festival, a poster of Papiko, an adult video actress with big breasts, catches his eye.

The unemployed Chiaki is the eldest of three brothers.  
With no parents, he starts job hunting to support his two younger brothers.  
Chiaki witnesses a young woman being sexually assaulted and tries to help, 
without knowing that this behavior would change his destiny.  


---
description.ru: Безработный молодой человек Чиаки является старшим братом в семье. Будучи без родителей, он начал поиски работы, чтобы поддержать двух младших братьев.И вот однажды, наконец, добившись финального собеседования, Чиаки стал свидетелем извращенца. Невольно попытавшись помочь, он даже не догадывался, что подобное поведение изменит его судьбу.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um jovem desempregado, e o irmão mais velho dentre os 3 irmãos, sem pais, ele começou a procurar emprego para ajudar a sustentar seus dois irmãos mais novos. Um dia, quando finalmente consegue uma entrevista, Chiaki avista um pervertido e involuntariamente tenta ajudar sem saber que essa ação mudaria o seu destino drasticamente.

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: 爆転シュート ベイブレード
爆転シュートベイブレード

description.en:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media 
  
The following link is to AnimeNewsNetwork for all of the various manga, anime adaptions, sequels, and spinoffs:  
[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)
